items.title: OpenAI, Microsoft tell Senate ‘no one country can win AI’
items.description: Executives like OpenAI's Sam Altman said US support for infrastructure would make it easier for AI companies to meet demand.

items.title: You can now fine-tune your enterprise’s own version of OpenAI’s o4-mini reasoning model with reinforcement learning
items.description: For organizations with clearly defined problems and verifiable answers, RFT offers a compelling way to align models.

items.title: How The Ottawa Hospital uses AI ambient voice capture to reduce physician burnout by 70%, achieve 97% patient satisfaction
items.description: TOH is using Microsoft’s DAX Copilot to capture physician-patient conversations and generate draft clinical notes in real time.
